description: FinTech Infrastructure: Payments, Custody & Trust Building the Foundation of Modern Digital Finance Perks & Networking Beyond the cutting-edge insights, we have curated a premium experience for every attendee: Mega Lucky Draw: Participate in our on-site raffle for a chance to win exclusive high-value prizes and substantial cash redoubts (Red Packets). New Year Blessings: Celebrate the season with on-site Red Packet giveaways available on a first-come, first-served basis, ensuring everyone joins the joy! Plus, a wide array of exclusive project merchandise will be available for free. Exquisite Gift: All attendees will receive a specially curated premium gift as a token of our appreciation. Gourmet Catering: We are providing two full rounds of professional catering (Breakfast & Lunch) to keep you fueled and focused throughout the day. Event Details Date & Time: 11 Feb (Wednesday) 09:00 13:00 (HKT) Venue: AWS HK Office (Tower 535, 17th floor, 535 Jaffe Rd, Causeway Bay) Agenda 09:00 09:30 Check-in & Networking 09:30 09:40 Welcome & Opening: AWS 09:40 09:50 Keynote: HashKey GroupSubject: HashKey Chain: The New Financial Infrastructure Speaker: Alex Ding 09:50 10:00 Keynote: AllScaleSubject: The On-Chain Neobank Speaker: Khalil 10:00 10:20 Breakfast & Networking Break & Lucky Draw 10:20 10:30 BenPaySubject: Self-Custodied Payment Infrastructure on Benfen Blockchain Speaker: Pearce 10:30 10:40 UnitasSubject: Institutional Yield Infrastruct...
